full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 184 of 262 1895 LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross 1 Q. And but you wouldn't necessarily be told who was going to be on the flight, right? 2 A. That's correct. 3 Q. I think you mentioned that on your direct exam, right, the names of the passengers wasn't one of these sort of critical pieces of information for you to know, right? 4 A. No. 5 Q. Okay. And, in fact, most of the time you didn't ever meet the passengers, right? 6 A. Other than we would know who they were. 7 Q. Sure. If you had passengers, for example, who flew often, you would get to know those people, right? 8 A. Right. 9 Q. All right. But a lot of times you were just at some point given some names of the passengers, right? 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. And you wouldn't necessarily be given all of their names, right? 12 A. No. 13 Q. Sometimes you'd be given some of the names and sometimes you'd be given all, but it was a mix, right? 14 A. That's correct. 15 Q. And there's no requirement under airline regulations that requires you to gather the names of the passengers, right? 16 A. That is correct. 17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013462

I think you mentioned that on your direct exam, right, the names of the passengers wasn't one of these sort of critical pieces of information for you to know, right? 4 A. No. 5 Q. Okay. And, in fact, most of the time you didn't ever meet the passengers, right? 6 A. Other than we would know who they were. 7 Q. Sure. If you had passengers, for example, who flew often, you would get to know those people, right? 8 A. Right. 9 Q. All right. But a lot of times you were just at some point given some names of the passengers, right? 10 A. Correct. 11 Q. And you wouldn't necessarily be given all of their names, right? 12 A. No. 13 Q. Sometimes you'd be given some of the names and sometimes you'd be given all, but it was a mix, right? 14 A. That's correct. 15 Q. And there's no requirement under airline regulations that requires you to gather the names of the passengers, right? 16 A. That is correct.
